attributes.action: Allow GPs to diagnose Gender Dysphoria
attributes.additional_details: Allowing GPs to diagnose Gender Dysphoria will put an end to the awfully slow waiting lists for transgender patients, too many people die during years of waiting for a first appointment. This will also put less pressure on our NHS.
attributes.background: Train GPs in diagnosing Gender Dysphoria for patients seeking puberty blockers and HRT

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action:

Increase funding for transgender healthcare to reduce waiting times & train GPs - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705870
